check.name: RegexpMultiline
check.description:
Checks that a specified pattern matches across multiple lines in any file type.

Rationale: This check can be used to when the regular expression can be span multiple lines.

property.name: format
property.description: Specify the format of the regular expression to match.

property.name: message
property.description: Specify the message which is used to notify about violations, if empty then default (hard-coded) message is used.

property.name: ignoreCase
property.description: Control whether to ignore case when searching.

property.name: minimum
property.description: Specify the minimum number of matches required in each file.

property.name: maximum
property.description: Specify the maximum number of matches required in each file.

property.name: matchAcrossLines
property.description: Control whether to match expressions across multiple lines.

property.name: fileExtensions
property.description: Specify the file type extension of files to process.
